column5: Great beachfront condo in the executive condominiums. Security gate & entrance, private elevator and fantastic view of the Gulf of Mexico beach & surf. Relax & enjoy the warm tropical breeze from your big private balcony overlooking the ocean & the huge swimming pool below. Condo #405 is in the heart of the entertainment district, convenient and close to all the nightlife, bars and restaurants. This condo has all you need to make your South Padre Island vacation enjoyable for the whole family.
column8: 2/2 Beachfront Condo, Large Pool, Private Elevator
